quality_assessment: Documentation is accurate, comprehensive, and well-aligned with implementation
positive_aspects: ComparisonResult structure (types.rs:4-22) accurately documented with all fields
ImprovementType enum correctly documents all 4 variants (Resolved, ScoreReduced, ComplexityReduced, CoverageImproved)
All 4 matching strategies documented with correct confidence values (Exact=1.0, FunctionLevel=0.8, ApproximateName=0.6, FileLevel=0.4)
CLI options (--before, --after, --plan, --target-location, --format, --output) match implementation in args.rs:474-490
Target status values match TargetStatus enum in types.rs:65-78
Project health metrics accurately reflect ProjectMetrics and ProjectChanges structs
Regression detection threshold (score >= 60.0) correctly documented and matches comparator.rs:116
Improvement detection criteria (resolved or >=30% reduction) matches comparator.rs:134-191
Correctly notes that ComplexityReduced and CoverageImproved are defined but not auto-classified
Comprehensive CI/CD integration examples for GitHub Actions and GitLab CI
Multiple output format support (JSON, Markdown, Terminal, HTML) correctly documented
All internal documentation links verified and valid
Clear troubleshooting section with actionable guidance
improvement_suggestions: Minor: Line reference for ImprovementType could be updated from 120-126 to 121-126 for precision
Consider adding a section on location format variations (e.g., file:*:line for LineRange pattern documented in location_matcher.rs:19)

metadata.validation_focus: Check that compare command features and workflow integration are documented
